name: Gambit (Amala_Network)
description:
• A third person isometric perspective represents the point of view of cameras that are recording the players actions.
  • Unique and fun mechanics to solve puzzles.
  • Unsettling game show aesthetic.
  • Levels can technically be completed in any order.
  • Thrilling story to create tension in gameplay.

The Mastermind has captured you, and you have only one way to escape! Taking part in his twisted game show! This is a dystopian game show in which you the contestant, are forced to use these products so that you can beat every level without dying. This whole event is televised for everyone to see, so do your best to beat every level with every item. You have to collect all collectible items in each level so that you may open up the portal to the next one.

You will traverse three distinct environments, each with a new gimmick and a new gadget for you to use. Each level will have an opportunity to use each new gadget, and keep your eyes peeled for any secrets that can be uncovered with any of the old gadgets. Can you collect all the items and beat the mastermind at his own game? Would you like to find out?
